name: Cyrus and John
venerable John Bosco
troparia: (Tone 5) Christ our God, You have granted us the miracles of Your holy martyrs, Cyrus and John,* as a stronghold and protection.* Through their prayers, strengthen those in authority in every good deed,* for You alone are merciful and the Lover of mankind!.
kontakia: (Tone 3) Holy ones, you received as a grace the power of miracles:* Do not cease to pour out your wonders on us.* By spiritual skill, cut out our passions, two great physicians,* divinely inspired Cyrus and holy John!
